item.title: 消息人士称，日本央行可能在报告中减少对美国关税打击的悲观看法
item.description: 三位熟悉日本央行想法的消息人士称，日本央行将在本月发布的季度报告中警告美国关税影响的不确定性，但对日本经济近期受到的冲击可能会给出一个没有三个月前那么悲观的看法。【原文：The Bank of Japan will warn of uncertainty over the impact of U.S. tariffs in a quarterly report due this month, but may offer a less gloomy view on the near-term hit to Japan's economy than three months ago, said three sources familiar with its thinking.】

item.title: 如果美联储鲍威尔提前离职，对冲基金青睐短期可转换债券
item.description: 对冲基金表示，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔明年任期届满前解雇他，他们已经做好了准备。【原文：Hedge funds say they are prepared if U.S. President Donald Trump fires Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell before his term expires next year.】

item.title: 有影响力的立法者称 WhatsApp 应准备退出俄罗斯市场
item.description: 一位负责监管 IT 行业的立法者周五表示，WhatsApp 应准备退出俄罗斯市场，并警告称 Meta Platforms 旗下的这款消息应用很有可能被列入限制软件名单。【原文：WhatsApp should prepare to leave the Russian market, a lawmaker who regulates the IT sector said on Friday, warning that the messaging app owned by Meta Platforms is very likely to be put on a list of restricted software.】

item.title: 美国参议员要求国防部提供有关微软中国工程师的详细信息
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一封信的副本，一名美国参议员要求五角大楼提供更多有关微软使用中国工程师维护军用云计算系统的信息。【原文：A U.S. senator is asking the Pentagon for more information on Microsoft's reported use of Chinese engineers in maintaining military cloud computing systems, according to a copy of the letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 外国直接投资下滑，中国采取行动鼓励外商再投资
item.description: 中国推出了鼓励海外投资者将利润在国内进行再投资的新措施，这是中国为扭转外国直接投资下降趋势所做的最新努力。【原文：China has unveiled new measures to encourage overseas investors to reinvest their profits within the country, its latest efforts to reverse a decline in foreign direct investment.】

item.title: 帕克新闻》称，如果派拉蒙与天舞公司的交易完成，前老板罗兹将参与哥伦比亚广播公司新闻业务的谈判
item.description: 据数字新闻网站 Puck 周五报道，如果 Skydance 收购哥伦比亚广播公司所有者派拉蒙全球公司的交易完成，天空新闻执行主席、哥伦比亚广播公司前新闻主管大卫-罗兹（David Rhodes）正在洽谈再次掌管哥伦比亚广播公司新闻的事宜。【原文：David Rhodes, Sky News executive chairman and former CBS News head, is in talks to run CBS News again if the Skydance acquisition of the broadcaster's owner Paramount Global closes, digital news website Puck reported on Friday.】

item.title: 富国银行出境禁令再次引发对在华经商的担忧
item.description: 美国富国银行（Wells Fargo）一名员工被禁止离开中国的消息传出后，人们再次担心外国公司员工有可能与中国当局发生纠葛。【原文：Fears that employees of foreign firms risk entanglement with Chinese authorities have resurfaced after news that an employee of U.S. bank Wells Fargo has been banned from leaving the country.】

item.title: 富世华首席执行官表示，为抵消关税正在重新打造供应链
item.description: 瑞典胡斯克瓦纳公司首席执行官帕维尔-哈伊曼（Pavel Hajman）告诉路透社，随着美国考虑大幅提高对欧洲进口商品的关税，该公司正在重新打造其供应链，以减轻全球贸易紧张局势带来的打击。【原文：Sweden's Husqvarna is reworking its supply chain to lessen the blow from global trade tensions as the U.S. considers steep hikes in tariffs on European imports, the company's CEO Pavel Hajman told Reuters.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克股价在血癌药物可能被美国拒绝后下跌
item.description: 葛兰素史克周五股价下跌超过 6%，此前美国食品及药物管理局顾问小组建议不批准其血癌药物 Blenrep，理由是早些时候人们对与眼睛有关的副作用表示担忧。【原文：GSK shares fell more than 6% on Friday after a U.S. FDA advisory panel recommended against approving its blood cancer drug Blenrep, citing earlier concerns over eye-related side effects.】

item.title: 中国有望保持贷款利率稳定，焦点转向政治局会议
item.description: 路透社的一项调查显示，由于经济复苏的迹象降低了进一步放松银根的紧迫性，市场普遍预计中国将在周一的月度定盘会上维持基准贷款利率不变。【原文：China is widely expected to leave its benchmark lending rates unchanged at a monthly fixing on Monday, a Reuters survey showed, as signs of economic resilience reduced the urgency for further monetary easing.】

item.title: 中国人民银行行长与美国银行高管讨论经济与金融市场
item.description: 中国人民银行周五发表声明称，中国央行行长潘功胜本周早些时候会见了美国银行国际业务总裁伯纳德-门萨（Bernard Mensah），双方讨论了经济和金融事务。【原文：China's central bank governor Pan Gongsheng met Bank of America's president of international business Bernard Mensah earlier this week to discuss economic and financial matters, the People's Bank of China said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 印尼官员称仍在就美国关税协议的细节和豁免问题进行谈判
item.description: 一位官员周五表示，在美国降低对东南亚国家的关税后，印尼仍在就最近与美国达成的贸易协议的细节进行谈判，并正在寻求对印尼出口的棕榈油和镍给予豁免。【原文：Indonesia is still negotiating the details of its recently-reached trade deal with the United States after the latter lowered tariff rates on the Southeast Asian country, and is pursuing exemptions for its exports of palm oil and nickel, an official said on Friday.】

item.title: 利洁时将以 48 亿美元的价格向 Advent 出售 Essential Home 业务
item.description: 消费品公司利洁时（Reckitt）周五表示，已同意向私募股权公司 Advent International 出售旗下的 Essential Home 业务（Air Wick 清新剂制造商），包括债务在内的交易价值为 48 亿美元。【原文：Consumer goods firm Reckitt said on Friday that it has agreed to sell its Essential Home business, maker of Air Wick fresheners, to private equity firm Advent International in a deal valued at $4.8 billion including debt.】

item.title: 巴宝莉公布第一季度可比销售额降幅小于预期
item.description: 巴宝莉（Burberry）周五表示，在截至6月28日的第一季度，其可比零售销售额下降了1%，降幅小于预期，这是这个在业绩不佳中挣扎的英国奢侈品牌复苏的早期迹象。【原文：Burberry said on Friday its comparable retail sales fell by a smaller-than-expected 1% in the first quarter ended June 28, in early signs of a recovery for the British luxury brand struggling with underperformance.】

item.title: 意大利日报报道，Kering 和卡塔尔的 Mayhoola 考虑出售华伦天奴
item.description: 据意大利一家日报周五报道，卡塔尔投资基金 Mayhoola 和古驰（Gucci）的所有者开云集团（Kering）正在考虑出售其共同拥有的华伦天奴（Valentino）时装品牌。【原文：Qatari investment fund Mayhoola and Gucci-owner Kering are considering selling their jointly-owned fashion house Valentino, an Italian daily reported on Friday.】

item.title: 萨博防务集团利润增长，上调 2025 年展望
item.description: 周五，瑞典国防材料制造商萨博公司（Saab）公布的第二季度运营收益增幅高于预期，并上调了指导性预期，预计在军费开支飙升的背景下，今年的销售额将更加强劲。【原文：Swedish defence material maker Saab reported a bigger-than-expected rise in second-quarter operating earnings on Friday and raised its guidance to project even stronger sales this year on the back of soaring military spending.】

item.title: 日本市场为大选对日本国债和日元的影响做好准备
item.description: 日本上议院选举是有史以来影响最大的一次选举，石破茂首相领导的联合政府可能会落败，投资者正在权衡创纪录的国债抛售潮是否还会继续下去。【原文：Heading into the most consequential Japanese upper house election in memory and a possible defeat for the coalition of Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba, investors are weighing whether a record sell-off in the nation's debt has further to run.】

item.title: 印度苹果经销商 Ample 首席执行官表示，随着业务和产品组合的扩大，公司收入将增长三分之一
item.description: 印度苹果经销商 Ample 公司首席执行官表示，该公司将依靠门店扩张、增加更多品牌和客户，在 2026 财年实现 35% 的收入增长。【原文：Indian Apple reseller Ample is banking on store expansion and adding more brands and clients to achieve 35% revenue growth in fiscal year 2026, its chief executive said.】

item.title: 伊莱克斯第二季度利润增长超预期，北美市场表现优异
item.description: 瑞典家电制造商伊莱克斯周五公布的第二季度营业利润高于预期，并表示价格上涨抵消了本季度与美国关税相关的成本增加。【原文：Swedish home appliances maker Electrolux reported a bigger-than-expected operating profit for the second quarter on Friday and said price hikes offset increased costs related to U.S. tariffs in the quarter.】

item.title: 外国投资者热捧伦敦无人问津的股票
item.description: 英国股市似乎终于扭转了多年来相对于欧洲其他国家表现不佳的局面，因为英美贸易协议、更宽松的监管和廉价的股票带来了丰厚的回报，开始吸引外国投资者。【原文：Britain's stock market finally appears to be reversing years of underperformance against the rest of Europe, as a UK/U.S. trade deal, lighter regulation and cheap stocks deliver juicy returns that are starting to attract foreign investors.】

item.title: 美国在 YPF 公司争端中站在阿根廷一边，投资者建议采用其他抵押品
item.description: 美国政府支持阿根廷的努力，暂时搁置法院要求其交出 YPF 石油和天然气公司 51% 股份以部分履行两名投资者赢得的 161 亿美元判决的命令。【原文：The U.S. government sided with Argentina's effort to put on temporary hold a court order that it turn over its 51% stake in oil and gas company YPF to partially satisfy a $16.1 billion judgment won by two investors.】

item.title: 中国间谍机构攻击外国 "窃取 "稀土的行为
item.description: 中国国家安全部周五表示，外国间谍机构曾试图 "窃取 "稀土，并承诺将严厉打击针对其重要矿产部门的渗透和间谍活动。【原文：China's Ministry of State Security on Friday said foreign spy agencies had tried to "steal" rare earths and pledged to crack down on infiltration and espionage targeted at its critical mineral sector.】

item.title: 早间竞价：股市活跃，但日本投票带来风险
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 中国商务部长称曾在北京会见英伟达首席执行官
item.description: 中国商务部长王文涛周五表示，他周四在北京会见了英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋。【原文：China's Commerce Minister Wang Wentao said on Friday he met with Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang in Beijing on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国希望美国贸易关系回归健康发展状态
item.description: 中国商务部长王文涛周五表示，中国希望与美国的商业关系回到健康和可持续发展的状态，并呼吁美国以符合其大国地位的方式行事。【原文：China wants to bring commercial ties with the United States back to a state of healthy and sustainable development, Commerce Minister Wang Wentao said on Friday, calling on the U.S. to behave in a way that befits its major country status.】

item.title: 外企高管卷入中国调查
item.description: 美国富国银行（Wells Fargo）的一名员工被禁止离开中国后，该银行暂停了所有赴华旅行。【原文：U.S. bank Wells Fargo has suspended all travel to China after one of its employees was barred from leaving the country, extending a trend of foreign executives caught up in probes by authorities that has chilled business sentiment.】

item.title: 印度 Wipro 公司季度盈利超出预期，股价攀升
item.description: 印度第四大 IT 公司 Wipro 周五早盘攀升 3.5%，此前该公司公布的季度盈利好于预期，原因是其美洲部分业务的客户支出有所改善。【原文：India's fourth-largest IT company, Wipro climbed 3.5% in early trade on Friday, after it posted better-than-expected quarterly earnings on improved client spending in parts of its Americas business.】

item.title: 伊拉克停电与关税担忧冲突，油价变化不大
item.description: 由于担心无人机袭击伊拉克北部油田会减少供应，同时又担心美国关税政策的不确定性可能导致需求下降，周五油价变化不大。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Friday after rising in the previous session as concerns drone attacks on northern Iraqi oil fields will cut supply vied with worries of potential demand declines amid uncertainty in U.S. tariff policy.】

item.title: 花旗集团与蚂蚁金服国际公司为客户试点人工智能外汇工具，帮助降低对冲成本
item.description: 花旗集团和新加坡金融科技公司蚂蚁金服（Ant International）周五表示，两家公司已推出一项试点计划，利用人工智能帮助客户更好地管理外汇风险。【原文：Citigroup and Singapore-based financial technology firm Ant International have launched a pilot program using artificial intelligence to help clients better manage foreign exchange risk, the companies said on Friday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市追随华尔街走高，日元在日本投票前走软
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市追随华尔街走高，原因是依然强劲的美国经济数据和强劲的企业盈利抵消了关税忧虑，而日元则在日本上议院选举前连续第二周下跌。【原文：Asian shares tracked Wall Street higher on Friday as still-strong U.S. economic data and robust corporate earnings offset tariff worries, while the yen headed toward a second successive week of loss ahead of Japan's upper house election.】
